titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Kings most excellent majesties proceeding with his army at Oxford and elsewhere as it was related by a Student from thence.
titleStmt.author: W. C.
T. H.

notesStmt.note: "The copy of a letter written from a student in Oxford to his friend in London" p. 3-5 is signed: W. C.
"The answer to the former letter" p. 5-8 a diatribe against Catholics is signed: T. H.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
